channel.title: CVE Feed for Autodesk -- Revit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Autodesk -- Revit

item.title: CVE-2024-7994|2024-10-18T18:01:01.085Z -- autodesk -- revit
item.description: A maliciously crafted RFA file, when parsed through Autodesk Revit, can force a Stack-Based Buffer Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-7994|2024-10-16T21:47:51.258Z -- autodesk -- revit
item.description: A maliciously crafted RFA file, when parsed through Autodesk Revit, can force a Stack-Based Buffer Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-7993|2024-10-16T21:47:31.739Z -- autodesk -- revit
item.description: A maliciously crafted PDF file, when parsed through Autodesk Revit, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, write sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37008|2024-08-26T12:44:55.475Z -- autodesk -- revit
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWG file, when parsed in Revit, can force a stack-based buffer overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.
